# OMDB API Movie Fetcher

This package allows you to interact with the OMDB API to fetch movide details based on some movie information. It provides functions to fetch accurate movie information using either a movie title or IMDB ID, or perform rough searches by partial title, and handle movie data in batches.

```{r}
library(OMDB.API)
```
